code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a white male aged 60 yrs presents with progressive moderate shortness of breath on exertion, moderate swollen ankles, severe chest pain on exertion and Heart for past 5 days. denies any alcohol use Patient does not smoke o:Height 67 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Chest = bibasilar rales, Heart = S3 is present, PMI is displaced, Heart = S4 present, 3/6 systolic murmur radiating to the neck, PMI is displaced, Extremities = 3+ pitting edema, Chest = B/L crackles are present the lower lobes, decrease breath sounds a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Coronary artery graft bypass - heart.

td.content: s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of severe chest pain on exertion. patient also reports moderate shortness of breath on exertion, moderate swollen ankles. pt is a 60 yo male. o:Height 68 in, Weight 173 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, Chest = bibasilar rales, Heart = S3 is present, PMI is displaced, Heart = S4 present, 3/6 systolic murmur radiating to the neck, PMI is displaced, Extremities = 3+ pitting edema, Chest = B/L crackles are present the lower lobes, decrease breath sounds a:Chronic Congestive Heart Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.
